716749f-a.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Hester Street

May 9, 1934.

716751f-a.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Hester Street
716751f-a.text:
103 Bowery, east side, north of Hester Street, showing a typical
restaurant and window menu.
1939
Alexander Alland
Neg e G92
This photo is one of a series that appeared in the published volume 'Portrait of N. Y." by Felix Reisenberg and Alex. Alland, IRGV.

716748f-b.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Hester Street
716748f-b.text:
(1)
Bowery, west side, north from but not including Hester Street. The view shows the Grand Street Station of the Third Ave., Elevated.
May 9, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
No asraooocrows. M g iE i 6GG
(2)
The same, a front view of Nos. 104-106 Bowery, west side, between
Hester and Grand Streets.
AuEust 2, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
